author: peteryouBuffalo
body:
#### PR description:

This pull request is a revision of a previous open pull request (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/39902) which added plots for comparison of purity and reconstruction efficiency of jets. In the original PR there were extraneous plots being produced and some spacing issues; this PR fixes those and updates compatibility to the current master.
@laurenhay 

#### PR validation:

Ran the PF validation and ensured that the new plots were being produced. Also did typical scram code checks and code format.
title: UPDATED: Adding of jet purity and efficiency plots to PFValidation package
